extendedInfo.description: JOIN MIKE, SULLEY, AND OTHER MONSTERS, INC. DUOS ON THEIR EPIC ADVENTURE TO SAVE BOO! Run, jump, and power your way through this monstrously fun action game! Journey through the city of Monstropolis with famous scare teams from Monsters, Inc., and find a way to rescue Boo! Check out the latest update that also features new Monsters University stages!â Play as 6 Monsters, Inc. tag teams!Choose from Mike and Sulley and your other favorite characters from the film. Use power-ups to call in your partner for help!â Dash through 6 worlds and 96 exciting stages!From the Monstropolis Rooftops to the Ice Cave, experience the monsters world like never before!â Master levels with over 20 explosive power-ups!Fly with jet-packs and attack with ray guns and more to get one step closer to Boo!â Take on familiar monsters from the movie!Dodge and blast through menacing monsters that stand in your way!â Go on an endless running adventure in Endless Mode!Collect coins and blow your way through monsters and blocks for high scores!â BONUS! Download Monsters, Inc. Run, and start off with FREE Bucks!Get 50 FREE Bucks to spend on new scare teams and life savers!Enter the world of Monsters, Inc., and start running today!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: It\'s great for kids, colorful,  entertaining, this app is the best yet!
reviews.author: Brenda Scaife

reviews.title: Not very happy.
reviews.comment: It\'s not letting me do anything.  It\'s asking to choose a theme but not giving me any options.
reviews.author: Jessica Lacrosse

reviews.title: Won\'t even open
reviews.comment: Game won\'t even load screen goes black then I\'m at home page and a message saying srry had to force close. Waste of money
reviews.author: James Tilger

reviews.title: Fun but buggy
reviews.comment: Pretty fun Mega Run clone with some very nice looking graphics. Still suffers from some bugs such as blank ads appearing and the endless mode failing to load, along with some minor performance issues.
reviews.author: Herman Rethuan

reviews.title: Won\'t load. Keeps force closing
reviews.comment: What a waste of money!!! Of course with how long it takes to download I can\'t get a refund. Do Not Purchase!!!
reviews.author: Nick Nipp

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.comment: What\'s with the bad reviews? This game runs perfectly, and it is worth buying I love it! I\'ve had no problems whatsoever.
reviews.author: Charlie Hughes

reviews.title: Great movie,  bad game
reviews.comment: There are a lot bugs to be fixed.  The game crashes every time you start to play. The game play sucks: while you are runing on the ground you end up dead in a second.  Waste of money
reviews.author: Valentin Argirov

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Great job GET SET!  Mega run  is/was awesome. I\'m a Disney freak lol. Combine the two for pure awesomeness . I\'ve been waiting a long time for the android port of this. Thank you Disney and get set!!!
reviews.author: shawn hopkins

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, fun to play a bit laggy but it\'s a new game
reviews.author: Clare Porter

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: It\'s a very fun game.
reviews.author: Colt Hochreiter

reviews.title: Fantastically fun game
reviews.comment: I played it in my iphone 5 whan it came out for 69p but now it\'s come out on Android Market I bought it even though it cost more its worth it especially as I am playing on my note 2
reviews.author: Sebastian Treloar

reviews.title: Blank white screen only see monsters
reviews.comment: It work oddly on my tablet can see monster but not backgrounds.
reviews.author: Linda Shannon

reviews.title: Ripped off :(
reviews.comment: I paid for this game thinking I could play it. Can\'t get passed \"pick a theme\" screen to play.
reviews.author: beth turvey

reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
reviews.comment: Thought it would be like temple run but it isn\'t
reviews.author: Reece Lee

reviews.title: Loads of Fun!
reviews.comment: Simple and addictive; fun to play and the graphics are great!
reviews.author: John M Amatangelo

reviews.title: Monsters Inc
reviews.comment: Love it so much fun, haha
reviews.author: Holley paige

reviews.title: Very cute :)
reviews.comment: I\'m a bit of a dork,  so this is perfect for me.  Love it, am sure the kids will too if they ever get to  try it :D
reviews.author: Angelica Balchen

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Amy Hardy

reviews.title: Does not work on my Toshiba Thrive
reviews.comment: Paid for it,  but after loading the first level the app quits. Please fix
reviews.author: Dave Schoeneck

reviews.title: Good game but background goes blank please fix
reviews.comment: Great game but the background goes blank when I play the game. Can only see upgrades, coins and monsters. Other than that great game.
reviews.author: simon turner
